<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List Global Source Templates"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/integrations/templates/sources/global"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



**Requires an Access Token as the bearer token.**

List global a source template.

Global templates are visible to all organizations and are maintained by Airbyte. You can clone them to create a local template.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"x-organization-id","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations.","title":"X-Organization-Id"},"description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
